function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pedestrians violating social distancing guidelines","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing guidelines, educate the public on the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, AI-powered object detection","People":"Pedestrians in mass surveillance areas","Owner":"Local authorities, health officials"},{"Description":"Inaccurate object detection leading to incorrect measurements","Impact":"Misrepresentation of social distancing compliance and risk levels","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and testing of object detection system, use of multiple detection algorithms","Technologies":"Object detection algorithms, calibration tools","People":"Research team, system administrators","Owner":"Research team, system administrators"}]}
